actions.message:
`Mod / Admin commands`

!kick [@user] [reason]     Kicks the mentioned user
!ban [@user] [reason]      Bans the mentioned user
!mute [@user]              Mutes the mentioned user
!unmute [@user]            Unmutes the mentioned user
!deleteChannel [#channel]  Deletes the mentioned channel
!deleteRole [#role]        Deletes the mentioned role
!purge [number]            Deletes specified number of messages
!warn [user] [reason]      Will warn a user for a reason - logged in their DM's and bot-log


`General Commands`

!verify                    Begins verification process on new member
!ping                      Returns your ping
!support                   Adds you to the support team - your job is to help members experiencing technical difficulties
!yt [search]               Will search YouTube and give you the top result
!help                      Lists available commands 
!cookie                    Free cookies!
!stab [user]               Stab somebody...
!shoot [user]              Why???
!destroy                   U mom gey    

`Discord Donuts Commands`

d!order chocolate donut with sprinkles -- example
d!help other commands :D

`Bot created by @Hexile#9642

Most ideas also given by @srsklrboii#5784`
actions.name: Send Message

```
Please mention one user in order to kick them!
!Kick [@user] [reason]
```

actions.message:
Hello!
Thank you for joining the server.
Please read #rules first, and be sure to comply with that. 
Failing to do so will result in a mute, kick or ban.
Your login password is: 

`!pass ${serverVars("password")}`

Paste this into #password to be granted permission to the server

This bot was created by @Hexile#9642
actions.name: Send Message
